reviewText: I appreciate how the course is designed with several interactive excersises. I just felt that it was too technical and presents historical approaches to designinig learning classrooms. However, I was hoping to learn more advanced, or unique learning skills since the word "innovation" is present in the title.But all in all, it's useful and helped me in my work. Thanks for everyone who worked on it.

I'm ﻿so happy because I was able to relate this  course defined for me what activities are relevant information each topic  and that surely I will include my students from the start where together we will formulate iILO until evaluation guided by both Blooms and Dublim. .I enjoyed the acti items and it made me realize that lteaching and designing makeslearning more exciting and meaningful.
Excellent ! Every Facilitator shoud learn this Course.
Excelente curso, bastante actualizado con la época y los avances tecnológicos.

Excellent quality content.  Teaching points are clearly explained with great examples. Very clear infographics for lesson review. Kudos to Susanna and Federica for their engaging teaching and  videos.  Those little quizzes at the end of each sections are marvelous!! Good job Politecnico Milano!
Great content. Engaging and very clear explanation by the instructor sussana
Great course with amazing teacher-designers and materials.
This is the best course to polish my teaching skills and aware about innovative teaching techniques.
A thourough, well constrcuted and clear course. Thank you!A plus would be to provide concrete examples of designs, assessements or activities at times.
